_header: At my house I have a Jay
_description: Animal noises: a schoolboy’s exercise in translation, with Latin original — six couplets

BLHar1002.First Lines:
At my howse I have a Jayehe can make mony diuerse
                    leye…
BLHar1002.Last Lines:
…he canne neye as a stedesuch a byrde yt [ ] were wode to
                    fede
BLHar1002.Editions:
Herrtage,  Sidney John Hervon,  and  H. B. Wheatley, eds.  
             Catholicon Anglicum, an English-Latin Wordbook 1483.
EETS
         o.s. 75 (1881), repr. 1987: 82.
Wright,  Cyril Ernest. 
             “Late Middle English Parerga in a School Collection.” 
             Review of English Studies
         n.s. 2 (1951): 114-20: 117.
